name: Infocom EasyFlash Collection V5.1
overview: The Drummers are drumming around the pear tree, so one final gift for you this year...if you've been good! A collector's Easyflash release for the C64 and C64C. Enjoy all the adventuring without all the disk swapping. Contains these classic Infocom text adventure games: • Beyond Zork • Border Zone • Sherlock • Zork Ultimate Underground If you've been bad, beware, you may be eaten by a Grue.
